name: Classic Beef Burger
description: Made with imported Australian Angus beef, paired with fresh lettuce, tomatoes, and secret sauce. Juicy in every bite.

reviews.comment: The patty is really thick and very juicy!
A little salty, but good overall.

name: Italian Tomato Spaghetti
description: Traditional Sicilian flavor. Sweet and sour tomato meat sauce coats every strand of pasta, topped with Parmesan cheese.

reviews.comment: The noodles are chewy, and there's plenty of sauce.

name: Iced Coke
description: Happy 'Otaku' Water (a common nickname), with ice and lemon. A must-have for summer.

name: Chocolate Lava Cake
description: Rich dark chocolate with a molten center that flows out when cut, paired with vanilla ice cream for a wonderful hot and cold sensation.

reviews.comment: A bit sweet, but the lava effect is amazing! Too bad it's sold out today.
